feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
